title: Loot Messing Up
body: Ok so I had three legendary skin shards for different skins and I decided to reroll them to get a legendary permanent skin since it says, reroll three of the same type to get a random unowned permanent of the same type. The three shards I used were dunkmaster darius, gentleman chogath and project yi. The permanent I received was hextech big bad warwick, not a legendary. I'm wondering why I didn't get a permanent legendary because I wouldn't have rerolled them if I knew I would get that crusty skin. I would have used my orange essance to make them permanents. I spent like $70+ dollars already on this game and I have not had any problems except this. I don't know where else I'm supposed to report this incident so I'm just gunna put it here. Can anyone help or explain this to me?

replies.body: When they say type I think that means same type of shard, so 3 skin shards get you a random permanent skin or 3 ward shards will turn into a random new permanent ward after re-rolling.  The quality of the skins used in the re-rolls doesn't matter at all.

What you get from a reroll is essentially *random* just like the loot you get out of chests and any other reroll, regardless of the value of rarity of the shard. It totally sucks that you didn't get a really good permanent out of this reroll, but the silver lining is you now know that everything is essentially RNG. I'd recommend disenchanting any unwanted high-value skins since they yield more essence than others.

Check out our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more info on the system and let me know if you have any questions.
